title: Erigon fails to shut down on sigterm & sigint if beacon chain not answering
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2022.09.1-alpha-4067b7c4

OS & Version: Rocky Linux 8, kernel 4.18.0-372.19.1 x64

Commit hash : 4067b7c4da6c5d741d3027d95ae2afdf6b7a943a

#### Expected behaviour

Erigon will issue a shutdown message, then perform full graceful shutdown within 20s.

#### Actual behaviour

  Erigon issues shutdown message, partially shuts down, but does not until 10 sigints or sigterms received, then prints a stack trace.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

1. Start up Erigon stack with no beacon chain connected.
2. Attempt to shut down with sigint or sigterm.
